name: There and Back Again
description:
This game was made as part of the Indie Speed Run 2015.(www.indiespeedrun.com)

Play as Jack who is who was dared to enter the "haunted" house for twenty bucks.
Traveling through three rooms you must chose carefully which items you bring with you as you may not make it out.

Credits:

Alex Hinners: 2D Artist and Sound Designer

Brandon Korth: 3D Artist

Jacob Klein: Level Design

Orrin Oliver: Programming
